cast: 泰勒·约翰斯顿 Tyler Johnston
贝利·斯科德里 Bailey Skodje
awards:
第70届美国导演工会奖(2018)
　　最佳电视电影/限定剧导演(提名) 凯拉·塞吉维克
director: 凯拉·塞吉维克 Kyra Sedgwick
introduction: When a compromising video of sixteen year old Deanna Lambert hits social media, her teenage life is changed forever. Overcoming bullies, hurtful school-yard taunts and the enduring rage and disappointment of her father, Deanna longs to escape a life defined by her past. Directed by Kyra Sedgwick (feature directorial debut) and starring Ryann Shane, Jon Tenney and Kevin Bacon, based on Sara Zarr's award winning novel, Story of a Girl is a coming of age drama about a young woman pushing beyond the shadow of her past to become the author of her own life.
